Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Observable<GameReport>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game extends Observable<GameReport>
Game is the central class of the model, inside game are present of the method neccessary to alter the model, and all the entities that represent the game, it is an observable due to the utilization of the observer pattern, when a part of the game is modified a notify is sent

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(boolean completeRules, int numPlayers)
      Creator of the class Game. It represent the entire match and from Game it is possible to reach every other entity and information. It only creates a Game, without any player in it
      Parameters:
      completeRules - is a boolean value to determine if the match has to be played according to complete or simple rules
      numPlayers - is the number of players who can join this match

  • Method Details

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Method to be called when the match is finished

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(Player p)
      Temporary method needed only to test the software. It adds a (already built) player with a pre-determined set of students in Entrance
      Parameters:
      p - the Player to be added

    • getProfessors

      public Map<Color,Player> getProfessors()
      Method to get the Map of the professors. Every professor is linked to the nickname of the player who owns that professor
      Returns:
      a Map of player and color

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String nickname, ColorTower color)
      Method to add a Player to the match
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the player
      color - is the color of the player's towers

    • getNumPlayers

      public int getNumPlayers()
      Method to return the number of players in the match
      Returns:
      an integer representing the number of the players

    • getRegisteredNumPlayers

      public int getRegisteredNumPlayers()
      Method to return the number of the current players connected in the match
      Returns:
      an integer representing the number of the players connected

    • getAllIslands

      public LinkedList<Island> getAllIslands()
      Method to return all the Islands
      Returns:
      a LinkedList containing all the Islands of the match

    • getMotherNaturePosition

      public Island getMotherNaturePosition()
      Method to return the Island where MotherNature is positioned
      Returns:
      the Island where MotherNature is positioned

    • getIsland

      public Island getIsland(int id) throws NoIslandException
      This method returns the island with the right id
      Parameters:
      id - is the identification number of the Island we want to get
      Returns:
      the Island with that id
      Throws:
      NoIslandException - if there is no such Island with this id

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer(String nickName) throws NoPlayerException
      Method to return the entity Player with that Nickname
      Parameters:
      nickName - is the identification String of the Player we want to get
      Returns:
      the Player with that id
      Throws:
      NoPlayerException - if there is no such a Player with that nickname

    • getAllPlayers

      public ArrayList<Player> getAllPlayers()
      Method to get all the Players connected to the match
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the Players

    • playCard

      public void playCard(Player player, int priority) throws OverflowCardException, IllegalMoveException
      Method to play a card. The card identified by the priority will be discharged (moved to the player's graveyard)
      Parameters:
      player - is the Player who plays the card
      priority - identifies the card the player wants to play
      Throws:
      OverflowCardException - if the Card is not present or if it has already been played
      IllegalMoveException - if the Player is not allowed to make that move

    • resetPlayedCards

      public void resetPlayedCards()
      This method is needed to reset the Hashtable playedCards. This Hashtable every turn remembers which cards had been played by the players, to avoid that a player plays the same card of the previous players

    • getMaximumMNMovement

      public int getMaximumMNMovement(Player p)
      This method returns the max distance MotherNature can travel
      Parameters:
      p - is the player who has to move MotherNature
      Returns:
      the max distance MotherNature can travel

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(Island island, boolean enableMovement) throws NoActiveCardException, IllegalMoveException
      Method to move MotherNature
      Parameters:
      island - is the Island where we want to move MotherNature
      enableMovement - When parameter enableMovement is true the method has the regular behaviour. If enableMovement is false, it will be checked if there's an active card.
      Throws:
      NoActiveCardException - if no Card is active
      IllegalMoveException - if the Player is not allowed to make that move

    • mergeIsland

      public Island mergeIsland(Island i1, Island i2)
      Method to merge two islands. This method deletes the two islands and replaces them with a single island containing all the students and towers
      Parameters:
      i1 - is the first Island
      i2 - is the second Island
      Returns:
      the new Island resulted from the merged

    • moveStudent

      public void moveStudent(int studentId, Movable arrival, Movable departure) throws IllegalMoveException
      Method to move a Student from a Location to another one
      Parameters:
      studentId - is the id of the student we want to move
      arrival - is the object (must be a Location) where we want to move the Student
      departure - is the object (must be a Location) where the Student is
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if there is no Student with such id on departure

    • exchangeStudent

      public void exchangeStudent(int studentId1, int studentId2, Movable arrival, Movable departure) throws IllegalMoveException
      Method to swap two Students between two Locations
      Parameters:
      studentId1 - is the id of the first Student to be swapped
      studentId2 - is the id of the second Student to be swapped
      arrival - is the object (must be a Location) where the first Student is placed (and where we want to move the second Student)
      departure - is the object (must be a Location) where the second Student is placed (and where we want to move the first Student)
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if one of the two Students is missing or it is not possible to swap the two Students

    • refillClouds

      public void refillClouds() throws NoMoreStudentsException
      Method to be called at the end of a complete turn to refill all the empty clouds
      Throws:
      NoMoreStudentsException - if the Bag is empty and it is no more possible to extract Students

    • selectCloud

      public void selectCloud(String playerNick, Cloud cloud) throws NoPlayerException
      Method to let a Player to select a Cloud
      Parameters:
      playerNick - is the Player who wants to select this Cloud
      cloud - is the Cloud the Player has selected
      Throws:
      NoPlayerException - if there is no such Player with this id

    • getAllClouds

      public Cloud[] getAllClouds()
      Method to return all the Clouds available in the game
      Returns:
      an array (length=4) containing from 2 to 4 clouds

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer(String nickname, boolean sendNotify)
      Method to set who is the current Player
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the current Player
      sendNotify -

    • setCurrentPhase

      public void setCurrentPhase(Phase phase)
      Method to set the current Phase
      Parameters:
      phase - is the phase we want to set as current

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public String getCurrentPlayer()
      Method to return the nickname of the current Player
      Returns:
      the String representing the current Player's id

    • getCurrentPhase

      public Phase getCurrentPhase()
      Method to return the nickname of the current Phase
      Returns:
      the current Phase of the match

    • getFinishedGame

      public Boolean getFinishedGame()
      Method to get a flag signaling if the game is ended or still running
      Returns:
      a boolean representing this flag

    • getIsLastTurn

      public Boolean getIsLastTurn()
      Method to get a flag representing if the current turn is the last one or not
      Returns:
      a boolean representing this flag

    • getWinner

      public String getWinner()
      Method to get the nickname of the winner
      Returns:
      the nickname of the winner of the match

    • resetRemainingMoves

      public void resetRemainingMoves()
      The variable remainingMoves is needed to remember how many times the current player can still move a student. This method reset the variable to the maximum number of moveStudents, according to the number of players

    • reduceRemainingMoves

      public void reduceRemainingMoves(boolean activeCard)
      This method reduces by one the variable remainingMoves if this is >0
      Parameters:
      activeCard - indicates if there is a card activated. This is needed to avoid that, when moving a student because of a special power, remainingMoves is decreased

    • getRemainingMoves

      public int getRemainingMoves()
      This method returns the numer of moveStudent the current player can still perform
      Returns:

    • initCardsFromJSON

      public Character[] initCardsFromJSON() throws IOException
      Method to initialize 3 random characters from the JSON file if the rules of the match are complete
      Returns:
      an Array containing the 3 characters
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong and the JSON file cannot be read

    • getActiveCard

      public int getActiveCard()
      This method returns the number of the active card (-1 if no card is active)
      Returns:
      the number of the activated card (0, 1 or 2) or -1 if no card is active

    • getCharactersCards

      public Character[] getCharactersCards()
      This method returns a copy of all the three characters available.
      Returns:
      an Array containing the three characters available

    • getCurrentRule

      public Rule getCurrentRule()
      This method returns the current Rule
      Returns:
      the current Rule

    • setCharactersCards

      void setCharactersCards(Character[] characters)
      Method needed only for test. This method sets the character
      Parameters:
      characters - is the character to be introduced in the match

    • getUsedCard

      public boolean getUsedCard()
      This method returns a boolean variable indicating if the activated card has been used or not
      Returns:
      this boolean variable

    • setUsedCard

      public void setUsedCard(boolean usedCard)
      This method sets the value of the variable usedCard
      Parameters:
      usedCard - is the boolean value to be assigned to the variable usedCard

    • usePower

      public boolean usePower(Player activePlayer, int card) throws NoCharacterSelectedException, IllegalMoveException
      This method is called when a character is activated
      Parameters:
      activePlayer - is the Player who has activated the card
      card - is the card activated by the Player
      Returns:
      a boolean value. If it is true, it means that the player has to perform other moves, if false, there is no need of other specific moves
      Throws:
      NoCharacterSelectedException - is thrown if the card the player wants to activated is not 0, 1 or 2
      IllegalMoveException - is thrown it is not possible to use a card in this phase

    • canExchange

      public boolean canExchange()
      It's a method which returns true if in this phase it is possible to exchange two students, false otherwise
      Returns:
      the boolean result

    • resetRemainingExchanges

      public void resetRemainingExchanges()
      Some characters allow to exchange students more than once in a single turn. Therefore a counter is needed and also a method to reset the counter at the end of the turn

    • reduceRemainingExchanges

      public void reduceRemainingExchanges()
      This method reduces of one the variable remainingeExchange needed to count how many times a player is still allowed to exchange Players

    • getRemainingExchanges

      public int getRemainingExchanges()
      Method to return the number of exchangeStudents still allowed
      Returns:
      an integer representing the number of exchangeStudents still allowed

    • getRequestedAction

      public Action getRequestedAction() throws NoActiveCardException
      This method returns the requested actions
      Returns:
      the requested Action
      Throws:
      NoActiveCardException - is thrown if there is no active card

    • getAllowedDepartures

      public Set<Location> getAllowedDepartures() throws NoActiveCardException
      This method returns the allowed Locations from where a Student can be moved, according to the phase of the turn and the active card
      Returns:
      a Set containing all the type of allowed Locations
      Throws:
      NoActiveCardException - if no card has been activated

    • getAllowedArrivals

      public Set<Location> getAllowedArrivals() throws NoActiveCardException
      This method returns the allowed Locations to where a Student can be moved, according to the phase of the turn and the active card
      Returns:
      a Set containing all the type of allowed Locations
      Throws:
      NoActiveCardException

    • disableIsland

      public void disableIsland(Island i) throws NoActiveCardException, IllegalMoveException
      This method disable an island (if a token is placed)
      Parameters:
      i - indicates the island to be disabled
      Throws:
      NoActiveCardException - if there is no active card
      IllegalMoveException - if there is already a Prohibition Token on the Island

    • disableColor

      public void disableColor(Player player, Color c) throws NoActiveCardException
      This method disable a Color after a character is activate
      Parameters:
      player - is the Player who has activated the special power
      c - is the Color to be blocked
      Throws:
      NoActiveCardException - if no active card is activated or the card activated doesn't allow to block a color

    • putBackInBag

      public void putBackInBag(Color color) throws NoActiveCardException, IllegalMoveException
      This method is to be activated only after the right character has been activated. This method puts back in the Bag three students of that Color of every Player
      Parameters:
      color - is the Color of the Students to be put back again in the Bag
      Throws:
      NoActiveCardException - if there is no active card or the active card doesn't allow to put back three Students in the Bag
      IllegalMoveException - cannot be thrown

    • getMotherNatureExtraMovement

      public int getMotherNatureExtraMovement()
      This method returns the bonus distance MotherNature can be moved
      Returns:
      an integer representing this bonus distance

    • needsRefill

      public boolean needsRefill()
      This method returns true if all the clouds are empty (because they have already been chosen by the players, false otherwise
      Returns:
      the boolean value if the clouds need to be refilled

    • refillActiveCard

      public void refillActiveCard() throws NoActiveCardException, NoMoreStudentsException, IllegalMoveException
      Method to refill the characters'cards that contain Students
      Throws:
      NoActiveCardException - if there is no active Card in this turn
      NoMoreStudentsException - if there are no more Students in the Bag
      IllegalMoveException - if the active Card doesn't contain any Student

    • sendErrorNote

      public void sendErrorNote(String mistaker, String error, String currentPlayer)
      Method to notify a mistake (if the action requested by the player is illegal) to the RemoteView
      Parameters:
      mistaker - is the nickname of the Player who sent the illegal move
      error - is the message of error to be transmitted to the Player
      currentPlayer - is the Player who is supposed to play in this turn

    • sendDisconnectionAll

      public void sendDisconnectionAll(String nickname)
      Method to notify all the Players if one Player has left the match
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the Player who disconnetted from the match

    • getCompleteRules

      public boolean getCompleteRules()
      This method returns true if the match is ruled by the complete rules, false otherwise
      Returns:
      true if the match is ruled by the complete rules, false otherwise

    • setLastTurn

      public void setLastTurn(Boolean lastTurn)
      Method to set the variable lastTurn if this is the last turn
      Parameters:
      lastTurn - is the value we want to apply to lastTurn

    • setNextLastTurn

      public void setNextLastTurn(Boolean lastTurn)
      Method to set the variable nextLastTurn if the next turn is the last one
      Parameters:
      lastTurn - is the value we want to apply to nextLastTurn
